name: Gaming Administration Panel Optimization
achievements: Enhanced the functionality of an administration panel for a global gaming and casino entity, focusing on marketing and bonus features. Collaborated across multiple repositories and effectively communicated with stakeholders across various locations, including London, Bulgaria, and New Zealand.

name: Traffic Engineering Solutions
achievements: Contributed significantly to a traffic engineering initiative, architecting tools for traffic simulations and essential ETL jobs. Leveraged Java-based frameworks within Kubernetes clusters, ensuring efficient operations and seamless integrations.

name: Sports Data to Wallet Integration
achievements: Led the integration of sports data into an existing wallet app, pioneering the creation of a vital frontend library in Angular. Acted as a mentor to incoming talent and facilitated effective collaboration among diverse teams encompassing designers, product owners, architects, and QA specialists.
